overview: In order to usurp power, the prime minister of Mengjia Kingdom, Maha Xianna, wants to marry his daughter to the prince Zhao Shutun. The prince fell in love with the beautiful and kind-hearted peacock princess Nanma Nuona. With the help of the goddess of Jinhu, the two betrothed each other for life. When the whole country was celebrating their wedding, Mahaxiana sent a wizard to the enemy country to ask for troops to attack Mengbanjia. In order to defend the country, the prince left his newly married wife and set out to fight against the enemy.
title: Peacock Princess
